title: Maken-Ki! Specials (Maken-ki! Secret Training)
synopsis: Each of the six volumes of the Maken-Ki! Blu-rays will carry a 10 minute long short anime "Doki Doki! Maken-ki! Himitsu no Kunren". Secret trainings with the main characters will be animated.
characters: ['Nijou, Aki', 'Himegami, Kodama', 'Amaya, Haruko', 'Kushiya, Inaho', 'Shinatsu, Azuki', 'Ootsuka, Celia']
voices: ['Harada, Hitomi', 'Yahagi, Sayuri', 'Shitaya, Noriko', 'Nomizu, Iori', 'Togashi, Misuzu', 'Ise, Mariya']
